org.mxupdate.eclipse
Interface IDeploymentAdapter

All Known Implementing Classes:
MXAdapter
public interface IDeploymentAdapter

Interface defining a common deployment adapter within eclipse needed to reuse the UI implementation.

Version:
$Id: IDeploymentAdapter.java 681 2010-01-31 12:31:28Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Method Summary
 boolean connect()
          Connects to the database.
 boolean disconnect()
          Disconnects from the database.
 String execute(CharSequence _command)
          Executes given _command within the console.
 String extractCode(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile _file)
          Extracts for given _file name the update code from the database.
 void update(List<org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile> _files, boolean _compile)
          Updates given update _files in the database.
 

Method Detail

connect

boolean connect()
Connects to the database.

Returns:
true if connected; otherwise false

disconnect

boolean disconnect()
Disconnects from the database.

Returns:
true if disconnected; otherwise false

update

void update(List<org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile> _files,
            boolean _compile)
Updates given update _files in the database.

Parameters:
_files - update files to update in the database
_compile - if true all program files are compiled; if false no files are compiled

extractCode

String extractCode(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile _file)
                   throws Exception
Extracts for given _file name the update code from the database.

Parameters:
_file - update file for which the update code must be extracted
Returns:
extracted update code
Throws:
Exception - if the update code from the database could not be extracted
